title: Mocked up what the PS5 UI will look like when I play Bloodborne

author: suyashsngh250
text:
I tried playing BloodBorne and it's a piece of shit waste of time game... Why aren't there any good checkpoints you die and lose and lose all your progression. The AI and graphics sucks...

This was my first Soul's type game and the game must be a pretty good game in the genre because everyone likes it, but I am curious why do you play it? The gameplay isn't even that good, Nioh's gameplay is just amazing with great focus on sword fighting, whereas you gotta dodge and find a rhythm to BloodBorne.

author: suyashsngh250
text: Oh no... Its a crap game, there is no checkpoint or save system which is weird. I started playing Nioh which has so much more complexity in sword and range combat, absolutely loving it.

author: ThisIsHonestlyHard
text: The game saves automatically what are you talking about?

author: suyashsngh250
text:
Like at start there is only lamp.... Ummmmmm... What and Why? The level design is very confusing too, small ledges and no recovery, Nioh you can recover from fall... Just these make dying in Nioh, your fault. But BloodBorne doesn't give opportunities and I wouldn't like to spend a lot of time in a game, whose game mechanics I hate.

I know it saves automatically when you exit.

author: ThisIsHonestlyHard
text: Find shortcuts, scattering the place with lamps is stupid. Making levels overlap that and connect is much more interesting than that. Nioh has worse fall damage than in Bloodborne. Stop blaming the game with your own problems.

author: suyashsngh250
text: Nioh has much better shrine placement... I mean if I am not liking the game why is it my problem? Ok dude I understand you like BloodBorne but not everyone does... Sorry... Also, I was playing looking through walkthrougha and shortcuts it still sucks.

author: ThisIsHonestlyHard
text: You called it a "trash" game. The game isn't bad, you are.

author: suyashsngh250
text: I mean I feel like the game is trash, just the way that it is built..Take a chill pill man, it's just a game. I am huge fan of sword fighting games but I was disappointed with BloodBorne and how hyped it was... Seriously, I really wanted to enjoy the game but I felt like why should I force myself to play something that I don't like.

author: ThisIsHonestlyHard
text: Try again then. You're missing out on what many consider the game of the generation.
